item.description:
1.0.0

📰 Important News

  • 💸 Reminder to support me & Loop by sponsoring the project
  • 💄 Can't donate? The next best way to support the project is to make some app icons for Loop!
  • 🌐 Localization: I will start requesting localizations for the next update so please let me know if you are interested in localizing Loop :)

✨ New Features

  • ✨ #361 Completely new translucent settings window
  • ✨ #303 Set up localization infrastructure
  • ✨ #344 New website for release notes
  • ✨ #251 Ability to ignore mouse screen
  • ✨ #235 Save cycle keybind index
  • ✨ #317 Make window snapping less sensitive
  • ✨ #212 Don't activate Mission Control when window snapping
  • ✨ #298 Ability to animate window resizes when preview is disabled
  • ✨ #298 Window animations no longer require screen recording access
  • ✨ #378 Add summer/developer app icons
  • ✨ #379 Ability to ignore screen with mouse
  • ✨ #380 Reduce useless cycle/custom action creation click
  • ✨ #384 Ability to move cursor with window
  • ✨ #389 Improve window animations when window snapping
  • ✨ #390 Ability to translate window location

🐞 Bug Fixes

  • 🐞 #299 Instant animation is not instant
  • 🐞 #347 Fix window being cropped to screen when restoring initial frames
  • 🐞 #95 Windows will now properly resize to bottom with window animations
  • 🐞 #350 Make window snapping work properly on secondary screens
  • 🐞 #314 Reduce Hyperkey conflicts
  • 🐞 #381 Make sure settings window buttons are themed properly

🥳 Notable Mentions

  • 🐞 #296 Fix typo
  • 🎨 #304 Reduce SwiftLint warnings
  • 🎨 #370 Use SwiftFormat rather than SwiftLint
  • ✨ #387 Add Luminare as git submodule
